New Records: Stephen Curry averages 26.4 points, 4.5 rebounds, and 5.1 assists per game; Anfernee Simons averages 22.6 points, 3.6 rebounds, and 5.5 assists per game; Deandre Ayton averages 16.7 points, 11.1 rebounds, and 1.6 assists per game; Buddy Hield averages 12 points, 3.2 rebounds, and 2.7 assists per game
Pre-Game Insights: Golden State Warriors added Buddy Hield to their roster to complement Stephen Curry; Portland Trail Blazers are focusing on developing young talent and experienced players; The match-up between Stephen Curry and Anfernee Simons is anticipated to be a key highlight
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at Moda Center in Portland; The game can be streamed live on NBA League Pass, ESPN Plus, and Fubo TV
